trans-unit.source: Note: On linux values that are longer than 127 bytes will be chunked into multiple keys, each 127 bytes in length. E.g. addExtraParameter('foo', 'a'.repeat(130)) will result in two chunked keys foo__1 and foo__2, the first will contain the first 127 bytes and the second will contain the remaining 3 bytes. On your crash reporting backend you should stitch together keys in this format.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在Linux上，长度超过127个字节的值将被分块为多个键，每个键的长度为127个字节。例如， addExtraParameter('foo', 'a'.repeat(130)) 将导致两个分块键 foo__1 和 foo__2 ，第一个将包含前127个字节，第二个将包含其余3个字节。在崩溃报告后端，您应该将这种格式的密钥缝合在一起。

trans-unit.source: Note: On macOS, Electron uses a new crashpad client for crash collection and reporting. If you want to enable crash reporting, initializing crashpad from the main process using crashReporter.start is required regardless of which process you want to collect crashes from. Once initialized this way, the crashpad handler collects crashes from all processes. You still have to call crashReporter.start from the renderer or child process, otherwise crashes from them will get reported without companyName, productName or any of the extra information.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在macOS上，Electron使用新的 crashpad 客户端进行崩溃收集和报告。如果要启用崩溃报告，初始化 crashpad 使用的主要过程 crashReporter.start 无论您想要收集的崩溃，其过程是必需的。一旦以这种方式初始化，崩溃垫处理程序将收集所有进程的崩溃信息。你仍然需要调用 crashReporter.start 从渲染器或子进程，否则崩溃从他们将没有得到报告 companyName ， productName 或任何 extra 信息。

trans-unit.source: Note: On macOS, using the asynchronous version is recommended to avoid issues when expanding and collapsing the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在macOS上，建议使用异步版本，以避免在展开和折叠对话框时出现问题。

Key values longer than the maximum length will be truncated.

The list of removed items can be obtained using app.getJumpListSettings().

trans-unit.source: Note Child processes created via the child_process module will not have access to the Electron modules. Therefore, to collect crash reports from them, use process.crashReporter.start instead. You can test this out by calling process.crash() to crash the child process.

trans-unit.source: A Accelerator (optional) indicating the item's accelerator, if set.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Accelerator （可选），指示该项的加速器（如果已设置）。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean for if the OS / Chromium currently has a dark mode enabled or is being instructed to show a dark-style UI. If you want to modify this value you should use themeSource below.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 用于表示OS / Chromium当前是否启用了暗模式，或者是否已指示其显示暗风格的UI。如果要修改此值，则应使用下面的 themeSource 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean for if the OS / Chromium currently has an inverted color scheme or is being instructed to use an inverted color scheme.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 用于表示OS / Chromium当前是否具有反向配色方案，或被指示使用反向配色方案。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean for if the OS / Chromium currently has high-contrast mode enabled or is being instructed to show a high-contrast UI.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 用于表示OS / Chromium当前是否启用了高对比度模式，或者是否已指示其显示高对比度UI。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean for the experimental option for enabling NodeJS support in sub-frames such as iframes inside the webview. All your preloads will load for every iframe, you can use process.isMainFrame to determine if you are in the main frame or not. This option is disabled by default in the guest page.
trans-unit.target: 甲 Boolean 为用于使所述的NodeJS实验选项在子帧支持诸如iframe内 webview 。您的所有预加载将针对每个iframe加载，您可以使用 process.isMainFrame 来确定您是否在主框架中。来宾页面上默认禁用此选项。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean indicating if the accelerator should be registered with the system or just displayed.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 指示加速器是应在系统中注册还是应显示。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean indicating whether the item is checked, this property can be dynamically changed.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 指示是否选中该项目，可以动态更改此属性。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean indicating whether the item is enabled, this property can be dynamically changed.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 指示是否启用该项目，可以动态更改此属性。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean indicating whether the item is visible, this property can be dynamically changed.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean ，指示项目是否可见，该属性可以动态改变。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property representing whether the notification has a reply action.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性表示通知是否有回复的动作。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property representing whether the notification is silent.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，表示通知是否为静默。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that determines Whether the window can be moved by user.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，确定用户是否可以移动窗口。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that determines whether or not this WebContents will throttle animations and timers when the page becomes backgrounded. This also affects the Page Visibility API.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，该属性确定当页面成为背景时此WebContents是否将限制动画和计时器。这也会影响页面可见性API。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that determines whether the image is considered a template image.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，它确定图像是否被视为模板图像。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that determines whether the maximize/zoom window button toggles fullscreen mode or maximizes the window.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，用于确定最大化/缩放窗口按钮是切换全屏模式还是最大化窗口。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that determines whether the menu bar should be visible.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，确定菜单栏是否应可见。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that determines whether the window can be manually closed by user.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，确定用户是否可以手动关闭窗口。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that determines whether the window can be manually maximized by user.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，确定用户是否可以手动最大化窗口。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that determines whether the window can be manually minimized by user.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，确定用户是否可以手动最小化窗口。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that determines whether the window can be manually resized by user.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，它确定用户是否可以手动调整窗口的大小。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that determines whether the window has a shadow.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，用于确定窗口是否具有阴影。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that determines whether the window is excluded from the application’s Windows menu. false by default.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，确定是否从应用程序的Windows菜单中排除该窗口。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that determines whether the window is in fullscreen mode.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，用于确定窗口是否处于全屏模式。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that determines whether the window is in kiosk mode.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，用于确定窗口是否处于信息亭模式。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that determines whether the window is in simple (pre-Lion) fullscreen mode.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，用于确定窗口是否处于简单（狮子前）全屏模式。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that determines whether the window is visible on all workspaces.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，确定该窗口在所有工作空间上是否可见。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that determines whether the window menu bar should hide itself automatically. Once set, the menu bar will only show when users press the single Alt key.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，确定窗口菜单栏是否应自动隐藏自身。设置后，菜单栏仅在用户按下单个 Alt 键时显示。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that determines whether this page is muted.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，用于确定此页面是否被静音。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that indicates whether network logs are currently being recorded.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，指示是否正在记录的网络日志。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that returns true if the app is packaged, false otherwise. For many apps, this property can be used to distinguish development and production environments.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，如果应用程序已打包，则返回 true ，否则返回 false 。对于许多应用程序，此属性可用于区分开发和生产环境。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that specifies whether the window’s document has been edited.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，指定是否已编辑窗口的文档。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that's true if Chrome's accessibility support is enabled, false otherwise. This property will be true if the use of assistive technologies, such as screen readers, has been detected. Setting this property to true manually enables Chrome's accessibility support, allowing developers to expose accessibility switch to users in application settings.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 属性，它是 true ，如果Chrome浏览器的辅助功能支持已启用， false 否则。如果已检测到使用辅助技术（例如屏幕阅读器），则此属性为 true 。手动将此属性设置为 true 可启用Chrome的辅助功能支持，从而使开发人员可以在应用程序设置中向用户公开辅助功能开关。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean representing whether the button is in an enabled state.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 表示按钮是否处于启用状态。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean representing whether this scrubber is continuous or not. Updating this value immediately updates the control in the touch bar.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 表示此洗涤器是否连续。更新此值会立即更新触摸栏中的控件。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean representing whether to show the left / right selection arrows in this scrubber. Updating this value immediately updates the control in the touch bar.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 表示是否在此洗涤器中显示左/右选择箭头。更新此值会立即更新触摸栏中的控件。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean specifying whether the request will use HTTP chunked transfer encoding or not. Defaults to false. The property is readable and writable, however it can be set only before the first write operation as the HTTP headers are not yet put on the wire. Trying to set the chunkedEncoding property after the first write will throw an error.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 指定请求是否将使用HTTP分块传输编码。默认为false。该属性是可读写的，但是只能在第一次写操作之前设置该属性，因为尚未将HTTP标头放在网上。第一次写入后尝试设置 chunkedEncoding 属性将引发错误。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean that controls ASAR support inside your application. Setting this to true will disable the support for asar archives in Node's built-in modules.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean ，它控制应用程序内部的ASAR支持。将其设置为 true 将禁用对Node内置模块中的 asar 归档的支持。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean that controls whether or not deprecation warnings are printed to stderr. Setting this to true will silence deprecation warnings. This property is used instead of the --no-deprecation command line flag.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean ，控制是否将弃用警告打印到 stderr 。将此设置为 true 将使弃用警告静音。使用此属性代替 --no-deprecation 命令行标志。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean that controls whether or not deprecation warnings will be thrown as exceptions. Setting this to true will throw errors for deprecations. This property is used instead of the --throw-deprecation command line flag.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean ，控制是否将弃用警告作为异常抛出。将此设置为 true 会引发弃用错误。使用此属性代替 --throw-deprecation 命令行标志。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean that controls whether or not deprecations printed to stderr include their stack trace. Setting this to true will print stack traces for deprecations. This property is instead of the --trace-deprecation command line flag.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean ，控制打印到 stderr 的折旧是否包括其堆栈跟踪。将此设置为 true 将打印堆栈跟踪以进行弃用。此属性代替 --trace-deprecation 命令行标志。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean that controls whether or not process warnings printed to stderr include their stack trace. Setting this to true will print stack traces for process warnings (including deprecations). This property is instead of the --trace-warnings command line flag.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean ，用于控制打印到 stderr 的处理警告是否包括其堆栈跟踪。将此设置为 true 将打印堆栈跟踪以显示过程警告（包括弃用）。此属性代替 --trace-warnings 命令行标志。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean that is set to true after the child window gets closed.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 子窗口被关闭后，它被设置为true。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean which when true disables the overrides that Electron has in place to ensure renderer processes are restarted on every navigation. The current default value for this property is true.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean ，当为 true 时,它会禁用Electron已有的替代，以确保渲染器进程在每次导航时都重新启动。该属性的当前默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean which when true indicates that the app is currently running under the Rosetta Translator Environment.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean ，当为 true 时指示该应用程序当前在Rosetta Translator Environment下运行。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean, true when the current renderer context is the "main" renderer frame. If you want the ID of the current frame you should use webFrame.routingId.
trans-unit.target: 甲 Boolean ， true 当当前渲染器上下文是“主”渲染帧。如果需要当前框架的ID，则应使用 webFrame.routingId 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean. For Mac App Store build, this property is true, for other builds it is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 。对于Mac App Store版本，此属性为 true ，对于其他版本，此属性为 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean. If the app is running as a Windows Store app (appx), this property is true, for otherwise it is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 。如果该应用程序作为Windows Store应用程序（appx）运行，则此属性为 true ，否则为 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean. When app is started by being passed as parameter to the default app, this property is true in the main process, otherwise it is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 。通过将app作为参数传递给默认app来启动app时，此属性在主进程中为 true ，否则为 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean. When the renderer process is sandboxed, this property is true, otherwise it is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 。渲染器进程经过沙箱处理后，此属性为 true ，否则为 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean. When this attribute is false the guest page in webview will not have access to the remote module. The remote module is available by default.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 。如果此属性为 false ，则 webview 的访客页面将无法访问 remote 模块。默认情况下，远程模块可用。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean. When this attribute is false the guest page in webview will not have access to the remote module. The remote module is available by default.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 。如果此属性为 false ，则 webview 的访客页面将无法访问 remote 模块。默认情况下，远程模块可用。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean. When this attribute is present the guest page in webview will be able to use browser plugins. Plugins are disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 。出现此属性后， webview 中的访客页面将能够使用浏览器插件。默认情况下禁用插件。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean. When this attribute is present the guest page in webview will have node integration and can use node APIs like require and process to access low level system resources. Node integration is disabled by default in the guest page.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 。出现此属性后， webview 中的访客页面将具有节点集成功能，并且可以使用诸如 require 和 process 之类的节点API来访问底层系统资源。来宾页面中默认情况下禁用节点集成。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean. When this attribute is present the guest page will be allowed to open new windows. Popups are disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 。出现此属性后，将允许来宾页面打开新窗口。默认情况下禁用弹出窗口。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean. When this attribute is present the guest page will have web security disabled. Web security is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 。出现此属性时，访客页面将禁用Web安全性。Web安全默认情况下处于启用状态。

trans-unit.source: A BrowserView can be used to embed additional web content into a BrowserWindow. It is like a child window, except that it is positioned relative to its owning window. It is meant to be an alternative to the webview tag.
trans-unit.target: 甲 BrowserView 中可用于嵌入附加web内容到 BrowserWindow 。它像一个子窗口，只是相对于其拥有的窗口而定位。它是 webview 标记的替代方法。

trans-unit.source: A BrowserView can be used to embed additional web content into a BrowserWindow. It is like a child window, except that it is positioned relative to its owning window. It is meant to be an alternative to the webview tag.
trans-unit.target: 甲 BrowserView 中可用于嵌入附加web内容到 BrowserWindow 。它像一个子窗口，只是相对于其自己的窗口定位。它旨在替代 webview 标签。

trans-unit.source: A Function that is fired when the MenuItem receives a click event.
trans-unit.target: MenuItem收到单击事件时将触发的 Function 。

trans-unit.source: A Function that is fired when the MenuItem receives a click event. It can be called with menuItem.click(event, focusedWindow, focusedWebContents).
trans-unit.target: MenuItem收到单击事件时将触发的 Function 。可以使用 menuItem.click(event, focusedWindow, focusedWebContents) 进行调用。

trans-unit.source: A Integer property representing the unique ID of the window. Each ID is unique among all BrowserWindow instances of the entire Electron application.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Integer 属性，表示窗口的唯一ID。每个ID在整个Electron应用程序的所有 BrowserWindow 实例中都是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: A Integer representing the unique ID of the view.
trans-unit.target: 甲 Integer 表示视图的唯一ID。

trans-unit.source: A Integer representing the unique ID of the window.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Integer 代表窗口的唯一ID。

trans-unit.source: A Integer representing the unique ID of this WebContents.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Integer 代表此WebContents的唯一ID。

trans-unit.source: A Integer representing the unique ID of this WebContents. Each ID is unique among all WebContents instances of the entire Electron application.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Integer 表示此WebContents的唯一ID。每个ID在整个Electron应用程序的所有 WebContents 实例中都是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: A Menu | null property that returns Menu if one has been set and null otherwise. Users can pass a Menu to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Menu | null 属性，返回 Menu ，如果已设置和 null 否则。用户可以通过菜单来设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: A Menu | null property that returns Menu if one has been set and null otherwise. Users can pass a Menu to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Menu | null 属性，返回 Menu ，如果已设置和 null 否则。用户可以通过菜单来设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: A Menu (optional) containing the menu item's submenu, if present.
trans-unit.target: 包含菜单项子菜单（如果存在）的 Menu （可选）。

trans-unit.source: A Menu that the item is a part of.
trans-unit.target: 该项目所属的 Menu 。

trans-unit.source: A MenuItem[] array containing the menu's items.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含菜单项的 MenuItem[] 数组。

trans-unit.source: A NativeImage | String (optional) indicating the item's icon, if set.
trans-unit.target: 一个 NativeImage | String （可选），指示项目的图标（如果已设置）。

trans-unit.source: A NativeImage representing the button's current icon. Changing this value immediately updates the button in the touch bar.
trans-unit.target: 一个 NativeImage 代表该按钮的当前图标。更改此值将立即更新触摸栏中的按钮。

trans-unit.source: A NativeImage representing the popover's current button icon. Changing this value immediately updates the popover in the touch bar.
trans-unit.target: 一个 NativeImage 代表酥料饼的当前按钮图标。更改此值将立即更新触摸栏中的弹出框。

trans-unit.source: A NodeJS.Process object. The process object in the main process. This is the same as remote.getGlobal('process') but is cached.
trans-unit.target: 一个 NodeJS.Process 对象。主流程中的 process 对象。这与 remote.getGlobal('process') 相同，但是已缓存。

trans-unit.source: A Number indicating an item's sequential unique id.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Number 指示项目的顺序唯一ID。

trans-unit.source: A Number property that determines the zoom factor for this web contents.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Number 属性，用于确定此Web内容的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: A Number property that determines the zoom level for this web contents.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Number 属性，用于确定此Web内容的缩放级别。

trans-unit.source: A Number representing the slider's current maximum value. Changing this value immediately updates the slider in the touch bar.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Number 表示滑块的当前最大值。更改此值将立即更新触摸栏中的滑块。

trans-unit.source: A Number representing the slider's current minimum value. Changing this value immediately updates the slider in the touch bar.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Number 表示滑块的当前最小值。更改此值将立即更新触摸栏中的滑块。

trans-unit.source: A Number representing the slider's current value. Changing this value immediately updates the slider in the touch bar.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Number 表示滑块的当前值。更改此值将立即更新触摸栏中的滑块。

trans-unit.source: A Record<string, string | string[]> representing the HTTP response headers. The headers object is formatted as follows:
trans-unit.target: A Record<string, string | string[]> 表示HTTP响应标头。该 headers 的对象的格式如下：

trans-unit.source: A ScrubberItem[] array representing the items in this scrubber. Updating this value immediately updates the control in the touch bar. Updating deep properties inside this array does not update the touch bar.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ScrubberItem[] 数组，表示此scrubber中的项目。更新此值会立即更新触摸栏中的控件。更新此数组内部的深层属性不会更新触摸栏。

trans-unit.source: A SegmentedControlSegment[] array representing the segments in this control. Updating this value immediately updates the control in the touch bar. Updating deep properties inside this array does not update the touch bar.
trans-unit.target: 一个 SegmentedControlSegment[] 数组，表示此控件中的段。更新此值会立即更新触摸栏中的控件。更新此数组内部的深层属性不会更新触摸栏。

trans-unit.source: A Session object, the default session object of the app.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Session 对象，应用程序的默认会话对象。

trans-unit.source: A String (optional) indicating the item's role, if set. Can be undo, redo, cut, copy, paste, pasteAndMatchStyle, delete, selectAll, reload, forceReload, toggleDevTools, resetZoom, zoomIn, zoomOut, togglefullscreen, window, minimize, close, help, about, services, hide, hideOthers, unhide, quit, startSpeaking, stopSpeaking, zoom, front, appMenu, fileMenu, editMenu, viewMenu, recentDocuments, toggleTabBar, selectNextTab, selectPreviousTab, mergeAllWindows, clearRecentDocuments, moveTabToNewWindow or windowMenu

trans-unit.source: A String that sets the session used by the page. If partition starts with persist:, the page will use a persistent session available to all pages in the app with the same partition. if there is no persist: prefix, the page will use an in-memory session. By assigning the same partition, multiple pages can share the same session. If the partition is unset then default session of the app will be used.
trans-unit.target: 一个 String ，用于设置页面使用的会话。如果 partition 以 persist: 开头，则页面将使用一个持久会话，该会话可用于应用程序中具有相同 partition 的所有页面。如果没有 persist: 前缀，则页面将使用内存会话。通过分配相同的 partition ，多个页面可以共享同一会话。如果未设置 partition ，则将使用应用程序的默认会话。

trans-unit.source: A checkbox menu item will toggle the checked property on and off when selected.

trans-unit.source: A Content Security Policy (CSP) is an additional layer of protection against cross-site-scripting attacks and data injection attacks. We recommend that they be enabled by any website you load inside Electron.
trans-unit.target: 内容安全策略(CSP)是对跨站脚本攻击和数据注入攻击的额外保护。我们建议您在Electron中加载的任何网站都要启用CSP。

trans-unit.source: A Good Editor
trans-unit.target: 一个好编辑

trans-unit.source: A WebView created in a renderer process that does not have Node.js integration enabled will not be able to enable integration itself. However, a WebView will always create an independent renderer process with its own webPreferences.
trans-unit.target: 在未启用Node.js集成的渲染器进程中创建的WebView将无法自行启用集成。但是，WebView将始终使用其自己的 webPreferences 创建一个独立的渲染器进程。

trans-unit.source: A boilerplate is only a starting point - a canvas, so to speak - from which you build your application. They usually come in the form of a repository you can clone and customize to your heart's content.
trans-unit.target: 锅炉模板只是一个起点--可以说是一张画布,你可以从画布上构建你的应用程序。它们通常以仓库的形式出现,你可以根据自己的意愿克隆和定制。

trans-unit.source: A bug fix comes into master that can be backported to the release branch. The patch is applied, and a new beta is published as 2.0.0-beta.2.
trans-unit.target: 一个错误修复程序进入master，可以反向移植到release分支。应用了补丁程序，并发布了一个新的beta 2.0.0-beta.2 。

trans-unit.source: A collection of resources for learning about Chromium and tracking its development
trans-unit.target: 学习Chromium和跟踪Chromium发展的资源集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of resources for learning and using V8
trans-unit.target: 学习和使用V8的资源集。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of rules that control how hostnames are mapped.
trans-unit.target: 以逗号分隔的 rules 列表，用于控制主机名的映射方式。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of servers for which delegation of user credentials is required. Without * prefix the URL has to match exactly.
trans-unit.target: 以逗号分隔的服务器列表，需要委派用户凭据。不带 * 前缀的URL必须完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of servers for which delegation of user credentials is required. Without * prefix the url has to match exactly.
trans-unit.target: 以逗号分隔的服务器列表，需要委派用户凭据。如果没有 * 前缀，则网址必须完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of servers for which integrated authentication is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 启用集成认证的服务器列表,以逗号分隔。

trans-unit.source: A command line tool on the other hand continues to support you throughout the development and release. They are more helpful and supportive but enforce guidelines on how your code should be structured and built. Especially for beginners, using a command line tool is likely to be helpful.
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，命令行工具会在整个开发和发行过程中继续为您提供支持。它们是更有用和更支持的工具，但是强制执行有关代码的结构和构建准则。特别是对于初学者，使用命令行工具可能会有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: A commit that has the text BREAKING CHANGE: at the beginning of its optional body or footer section introduces a breaking API change (correlating with Major in semantic versioning). A breaking change can be part of commits of any type. e.g., a fix:, feat: & chore: types would all be valid, in addition to any other type.
trans-unit.target: 带有文本 BREAKING CHANGE: 的提交，在其可选的body或footer部分的开头，引入了重大的API更改（与语义版本控制中的Major相关）。重大更改可以是任何类型的提交的一部分。例如，除了任何其他类型外， fix: ， feat: ＆ chore: 类型都将是有效的。

trans-unit.source: A common attack pattern is that the attacker convinces your app's users to interact with the app in such a way that it navigates to one of the attacker's pages. This is usually done via links, plugins, or other user-generated content.
trans-unit.target: 一个常见的攻击模式是,攻击者说服你的应用程序的用户以这样的方式与应用程序进行交互,使其导航到攻击者的一个页面。这通常是通过链接、插件或其他用户生成的内容来实现的。

trans-unit.source: A cross-site-scripting (XSS) attack is more dangerous if an attacker can jump out of the renderer process and execute code on the user's computer. Cross-site-scripting attacks are fairly common - and while an issue, their power is usually limited to messing with the website that they are executed on. Disabling Node.js integration helps prevent an XSS from being escalated into a so-called "Remote Code Execution" (RCE) attack.
trans-unit.target: 如果攻击者可以跳出渲染器进程,在用户的计算机上执行代码,那么跨站脚本(XSS)攻击就比较危险。跨站脚本攻击相当常见--虽然是个问题,但其威力通常仅限于搞乱被执行的网站。禁用Node.js集成有助于防止XSS升级为所谓的 "远程代码执行"(RCE)攻击。

trans-unit.source: A detailed look at our versioning policy and implementation.
trans-unit.target: 详细介绍一下我们的版本政策和实施情况。

trans-unit.source: A few examples of how various semver ranges will pick up new releases:
trans-unit.target: 各个semver范围将如何拿起新版本的几个例子。

trans-unit.source: A frameless window is a window that has no chrome, the parts of the window, like toolbars, that are not a part of the web page. These are options on the BrowserWindow class.
trans-unit.target: 无框窗口是没有chrome的窗口，窗口的一部分（例如工具栏）不是网页的一部分。这些是 BrowserWindow 类的选项。

trans-unit.source: A frameless window is a window that has no chrome, the parts of the window, like toolbars, that are not a part of the web page. These are options on the BrowserWindow class.
trans-unit.target: 无框窗口是没有chrome的窗口，窗口的一部分（例如工具栏）不是网页的一部分。这些是 BrowserWindow 类的选项。

trans-unit.source: A good commit message should describe what changed and why. The Electron project uses semantic commit messages to streamline the release process.
trans-unit.target: 良好的提交消息应说明更改的内容以及原因。Electron项目使用语义提交消息来简化发布过程。

trans-unit.target: 关于拉/推的说明

trans-unit.source: A preload script can accidentally leak privileged APIs to untrusted code, unless contextIsolation is also enabled.
trans-unit.target: 除非还启用了 contextIsolation ，否则预加载脚本可能会将特权API意外泄漏给不受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: A preload script can accidentally leak privileged APIs to untrusted code, unless contextIsolation is also enabled.
trans-unit.target: 除非还启用了 contextIsolation ，否则预加载脚本可能会将特权API意外泄漏给不受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: A preload script can accidentally leak privileged APIs to untrusted code.
trans-unit.target: 预加载脚本可能会意外地将特权API泄露给不受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: A process is an instance of a computer program that is being executed. Electron apps that make use of the main and one or many renderer process are actually running several programs simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 进程是正在执行的计算机程序的实例。利用主渲染程序和一个或多个渲染程序的电子应用程序实际上正在同时运行多个程序。

trans-unit.source: A progress bar enables a window to provide progress information to the user without the need of switching to the window itself.
trans-unit.target: 进度条使窗口能够向用户提供进度信息,而不需要切换到窗口本身。

trans-unit.source: A protocol is registered to a specific Electron session object. If you don't specify a session, then your protocol will be applied to the default session that Electron uses. However, if you define a partition or session on your browserWindow's webPreferences, then that window will use a different session and your custom protocol will not work if you just use electron.protocol.XXX.
trans-unit.target: 协议已注册到特定的电子 session 对象。如果您未指定会话，则您的 protocol 将应用于Electron使用的默认会话。但是，如果您在 browserWindow 的 webPreferences 上定义了 partition 或 session ，则该窗口将使用其他会话，并且如果仅使用 electron.protocol.XXX ,则自定义协议将不起作用。

trans-unit.source: A protocol is registered to a specific Electron session object. If you don't specify a session, then your protocol will be applied to the default session that Electron uses. However, if you define a partition or session on your browserWindow's webPreferences, then that window will use a different session and your custom protocol will not work if you just use electron.protocol.XXX.
trans-unit.target: 协议已注册到特定的电子 session 对象。如果您未指定会话，则您的 protocol 将应用于Electron使用的默认会话。但是，如果您在 browserWindow 的 webPreferences 上定义了 partition 或 session ，则该窗口将使用其他会话，并且仅使用 electron.protocol.XXX 不能使用自定义协议。

trans-unit.source: A sandboxed renderer doesn't have a Node.js environment running and doesn't expose Node.js JavaScript APIs to client code. The only exception is the preload script, which has access to a subset of the Electron renderer API.
trans-unit.target: 沙盒渲染器没有运行Node.js环境,也不会将Node.js JavaScript APIs暴露给客户端代码。唯一的例外是预加载脚本,它可以访问Electron渲染器API的一个子集。

trans-unit.source: A sandboxed renderer doesn't have a node.js environment running and doesn't expose node.js JavaScript APIs to client code. The only exception is the preload script, which has access to a subset of the electron renderer API.
trans-unit.target: 沙盒渲染器没有运行node.js环境,也不会将node.js JavaScript APIs暴露给客户端代码。唯一的例外是预加载脚本,它可以访问电子渲染器API的一个子集。

trans-unit.source: A security issue exists whenever you receive code from a remote destination and execute it locally. As an example, consider a remote website being displayed inside a BrowserWindow. If an attacker somehow manages to change said content (either by attacking the source directly, or by sitting between your app and the actual destination), they will be able to execute native code on the user's machine.
trans-unit.target: 每当您从远程目标接收代码并在本地执行代码时，都会存在安全问题。例如，考虑在 BrowserWindow 内显示一个远程网站。如果攻击者设法以某种方式更改了上述内容（通过直接攻击源，或坐在您的应用与实际目标之间），他们将能够在用户计算机上执行本机代码。

trans-unit.source: A security issue exists whenever you receive code from an untrusted source (e.g. a remote server) and execute it locally. As an example, consider a remote website being displayed inside a default BrowserWindow. If an attacker somehow manages to change said content (either by attacking the source directly, or by sitting between your app and the actual destination), they will be able to execute native code on the user's machine.
trans-unit.target: 每当您从不受信任的源（例如，远程服务器）接收代码并在本地执行代码时，都会存在安全问题。例如， BrowserWindow 一个远程网站显示在默认的BrowserWindow中。如果攻击者设法以某种方式更改了上述内容（通过直接攻击源，或坐在您的应用与实际目标之间），他们将能够在用户计算机上执行本机代码。

trans-unit.source: A security issue exists whenever you receive code from an untrusted source (e.g. a remote server) and execute it locally. As an example, consider a remote website being displayed inside a default BrowserWindow. If an attacker somehow manages to change said content (either by attacking the source directly, or by sitting between your app and the actual destination), they will be able to execute native code on the user's machine.
trans-unit.target: 每当您从不受信任的来源（例如，远程服务器）接收代码并在本地执行代码时，都会存在安全问题。例如， BrowserWindow 一个远程网站显示在默认的BrowserWindow中。如果攻击者设法以某种方式更改了上述内容（通过直接攻击源，或坐在您的应用与实际目标之间），他们将能够在用户计算机上执行本机代码。

trans-unit.source: A shared library that includes the Chromium Content module and all its dependencies (e.g., Blink, V8, etc.). Also referred to as "libcc".
trans-unit.target: 包含Chromium Content模块及其所有依赖项（例如Blink，V8等）的共享库。也称为“ libcc”。

trans-unit.source: A standard scheme adheres to what RFC 3986 calls generic URI syntax. For example http and https are standard schemes, while file is not.
trans-unit.target: 标准方案遵循RFC 3986所谓的通用URI语法。例如， http 和 https 是标准方案，而 file 不是。

trans-unit.source: A typical example is Google Fonts. Many developers make use of Google's impressive collection of free fonts, which comes with a content delivery network. The pitch is straightforward: Include a few lines of CSS and Google will take care of the rest.
trans-unit.target: 一个典型的例子是Google Fonts。许多开发者利用Google令人印象深刻的免费字体集合,它带有一个内容交付网络。其推销方式很直接。包含几行CSS,其余的由Google来处理。

trans-unit.source: A user activity can be continued only in an app that has the same developer Team ID as the activity's source app and that supports the activity's type. Supported activity types are specified in the app's Info.plist under the NSUserActivityTypes key.
trans-unit.target: 用户活动只能在具有与活动源应用程序相同的开发人员团队ID且支持活动类型的应用程序中继续。受支持的活动类型在应用程序的 Info.plist 中的 NSUserActivityTypes 项下指定。

trans-unit.source: A value that links the webview to a specific webContents. When a webview first loads a new webContents is created and this attribute is set to its instance identifier. Setting this attribute on a new or existing webview connects it to the existing webContents that currently renders in a different webview.
trans-unit.target: 一个将webview链接到特定webContents的值。当webview首次加载时,会创建一个新的webContents,该属性被设置为其实例标识符。在新的或现有的webview上设置此属性,会将其连接到当前在不同webview中渲染的现有webContents。

trans-unit.source: A window in Electron is for instance created using the BrowserWindow class. It is only available in the main process.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用 BrowserWindow 类在Electron中创建一个窗口。它仅在主要过程中可用。

trans-unit.source: ASAR
trans-unit.target: ASAR

trans-unit.source: ASAR stands for Atom Shell Archive Format. An asar archive is a simple tar-like format that concatenates files into a single file. Electron can read arbitrary files from it without unpacking the whole file.
trans-unit.target: ASAR代表Atom Shell存档格式。asar归档文件是一种简单的类似 tar 的格式，可将文件连接成一个文件。Electron可以从其中读取任意文件，而无需解压缩整个文件。

trans-unit.target: Accelerator

trans-unit.source: Accelerators are Strings that can contain multiple modifiers and a single key code, combined by the + character, and are used to define keyboard shortcuts throughout your application.
trans-unit.target: 加速器是可以包含多个修饰符和单个键代码（由 + 字符组合）的字符串，用于在整个应用程序中定义键盘快捷键。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: Accessibility

trans-unit.source: Accessibility concerns in Electron applications are similar to those of websites because they're both ultimately HTML. With Electron apps, however, you can't use the online resources for accessibility audits because your app doesn't have a URL to point the auditor to.
trans-unit.target: Electron应用程序的可访问性问题与网站的可访问性问题类似,因为它们最终都是HTML。然而,对于Electron应用程序,您不能使用在线资源进行无障碍性审核,因为您的应用程序没有URL指向审核员。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, it's possible for preload scripts to accidentally leak modules to a sandboxed renderer. Leaking remote arms malicious code with a multitude of main process modules with which to perform an attack.
trans-unit.target: 此外，预加载脚本可能会将模块意外泄漏到沙盒渲染器。泄漏带有大量用于执行攻击的主要流程模块的 remote 武器恶意代码。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, on macOS, the visibility state also tracks the window occlusion state. If the window is occluded (i.e. fully covered) by another window, the visibility state will be hidden. On other platforms, the visibility state will be hidden only when the window is minimized or explicitly hidden with win.hide().
trans-unit.target: 此外，在macOS上，可见性状态还跟踪窗口遮挡状态。如果该窗口被另一个窗口遮挡（即完全覆盖），则可见性状态将被 hidden 。在其他平台上，仅当窗口最小化或使用 win.hide() 显式隐藏时，可见性状态才会 hidden 。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, setting the Connection header to the value upgrade is also disallowed.
trans-unit.target: 此外，也不允许将 Connection 标头设置为值 upgrade 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a chunk of data to the request body. The first write operation may cause the request headers to be issued on the wire. After the first write operation, it is not allowed to add or remove a custom header.
trans-unit.target: 在请求体中添加一大块数据。第一次写操作可能会导致请求头在线上发出。第一次写操作后,不允许添加或删除自定义头。

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for an invokeable IPC. This handler will be called whenever a renderer calls ipcRenderer.invoke(channel, ...args).
trans-unit.target: 为可 invoke IPC添加处理程序。每当渲染器调用 ipcRenderer.invoke(channel, ...args) 时，都会调用此处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Adds a one time listener function for the event. This listener is invoked only the next time a message is sent to channel, after which it is removed.
trans-unit.target: 为事件添加一次 listener 功能。仅在下一次将消息发送到 channel 时才调用此 listener 器，然后将其删除。

trans-unit.source: Adds a vibrancy effect to the browser window. Passing null or an empty string will remove the vibrancy effect on the window.
trans-unit.target: 在浏览器窗口中添加生动效果。传递 null 或空字符串将消除窗口上的鲜艳效果。

trans-unit.source: Adds a window as a tab on this window, after the tab for the window instance.
trans-unit.target: 在该窗口实例的标签后,添加一个窗口作为该窗口的标签。

trans-unit.source: Adds an extra HTTP header. The header name will be issued as-is without lowercasing. It can be called only before first write. Calling this method after the first write will throw an error. If the passed value is not a String, its toString() method will be called to obtain the final value.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个额外的HTTP标头。标头名称将原封不动地发布。只能在首次写入之前调用它。第一次写入后调用此方法将引发错误。如果传递的值不是 String ，则将调用其 toString() 方法以获得最终值。

trans-unit.source: Adds an extra HTTP header. The header name will issued as it is without lowercasing. It can be called only before first write. Calling this method after the first write will throw an error. If the passed value is not a String, its toString() method will be called to obtain the final value.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个额外的HTTP标头。标头名称将按原样发布，不会小写。只能在首次写入之前调用它。第一次写入后调用此方法将引发错误。如果传递的值不是 String ，则将调用其 toString() 方法以获得最终值。

trans-unit.source: Adds scripts that will be executed on ALL web contents that are associated with this session just before normal preload scripts run.
trans-unit.target: 添加将在正常 preload 脚本运行之前在与此会话关联的所有Web内容上执行的脚本。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified path to DevTools workspace. Must be used after DevTools creation:
trans-unit.target: 将指定的路径添加到DevTools工作区。必须在创建DevTools后使用。

trans-unit.source: Admitting feature-flagged changes, that do not otherwise alter existing code paths, at most points in the beta cycle is okay. Users can explicitly enable those flags in their apps.
trans-unit.target: 在测试周期的大部分时间里,如果不改变现有的代码路径,接纳功能标志的更改是可以的。用户可以在其应用程序中明确启用这些标志。

trans-unit.source: Admitting features of any sort after Week 3 in the beta cycle is 👎 without a very good reason.
trans-unit.target: 在测试周期的第三周后,如果没有很好的理由,承认任何形式的功能是👎。

trans-unit.source: Admitting non-breaking-API changes before Week 3 in the beta cycle is okay, even if those changes have the potential to cause moderate side-effects
trans-unit.target: 在β周期的第3周之前承认非突破性的API变化是可以的,即使这些变化有可能导致中度的副作用。

trans-unit.source: After completing all of the above, open your cross-compilation command prompt and run set npm_config_arch=arm64. Then use npm install to build your project as normal. As with cross-compiling x86 modules, you may need to remove node_modules to force recompilation of native modules if they were previously compiled for another architecture.
trans-unit.target: 完成上述所有操作后，打开交叉编译命令提示符并运行 set npm_config_arch=arm64 。然后使用 npm install 正常构建项目。与交叉编译x86模块一样，如果以前为其他体系结构编译了本机模块，则可能需要删除 node_modules 以强制重新编译本机模块。

trans-unit.source: After finishing the preparation work, you can package your app by following Application Distribution, and then proceed to signing your app.
trans-unit.target: 在完成准备工作之后，您可以按照Application Distribution打包您的应用程序，然后继续对您的应用程序进行签名。

trans-unit.source: After finishing the preparation work, you can package your app by following Application Distribution, and then proceed to signing your app.
trans-unit.target: 在完成准备工作之后，您可以按照Application Distribution打包您的应用程序，然后继续对您的应用程序进行签名。

trans-unit.source: After getting the library files, you should pass the path to the file with --widevine-cdm-path command line switch, and the library's version with --widevine-cdm-version switch. The command line switches have to be passed before the ready event of app module gets emitted.
trans-unit.target: 获取库文件后，应使用 --widevine-cdm-path 命令行开关将路径传递到文件，并使用 --widevine-cdm-version 开关将库的版本传递给文件。必须发出命令行开关，然后发出 app 模块的 ready 事件。

trans-unit.source: After getting the plugin files, you should pass the widevinecdmadapter's path to Electron with --widevine-cdm-path command line switch, and the plugin's version with --widevine-cdm-version switch.
trans-unit.target: 获取插件文件后，应使用 --widevine-cdm-path 命令行开关将 widevinecdmadapter 的路径传递给Electron ，并使用 --widevine-cdm-version 开关将插件的版本传递给Electron 。

trans-unit.target: 启动Electron应用程序后,您可以通过点击相应的按钮来改变模式或将主题重置为系统默认值。

trans-unit.target: 启动Electron应用程序后,您应该看到通知。

trans-unit.source: After re-uploading all distributions, publish again to upload the checksum file:
trans-unit.target: 重新上传所有发行版后,再次发布上传校验文件。

trans-unit.source: After running the command, you will notice that a folder named app.asar.unpacked was created together with the app.asar file. It contains the unpacked files and should be shipped together with the app.asar archive.
trans-unit.target: 运行该命令后，您会注意到与 app.asar 文件一起创建了一个名为 app.asar.unpacked 的文件夹。它包含解压缩的文件，应与 app.asar 存档一起发送。

trans-unit.source: After signing your app, you can use Application Loader to upload it to iTunes Connect for processing, making sure you have created a record before uploading.
trans-unit.target: 对您的应用程序签名后，可以使用Application Loader将其上传到iTunes Connect进行处理，确保在上传之前已创建了一条记录。

trans-unit.source: After these steps, you can submit your app for review.
trans-unit.target: 完成这些步骤后，您可以提交您的应用进行审核。

trans-unit.source: After this, you can grant additional permissions for specific hosts. For example, if you are opening a BrowserWindow pointed at https://example.com/, you can give that website exactly the abilities it needs, but no more.
trans-unit.target: 之后，您可以为特定主机授予其他权限。例如，如果您打开指向 https://example.com/ 的BrowserWindow ，则可以为该网站提供所需的功能，但仅此而已。

trans-unit.source: After this, you can grant additional permissions for specific hosts. For example, if you are opening a BrowserWindow pointed at `https://my-website.com/", you can give that website exactly the abilities it needs, but no more.
trans-unit.target: 之后，您可以为特定主机授予其他权限。例如，如果要打开指向` https://my-website.com/的BrowserWindow ，则可以为该网站提供所需的功能，但仅此而已。

trans-unit.source: After you upgrade Electron, you usually need to rebuild the modules.
trans-unit.target: 升级Electron后,通常需要重建模块。

trans-unit.source: Again, this list merely minimizes the risk, it does not remove it. If your goal is to display a website, a browser will be a more secure option.
trans-unit.target: 同样,这个列表只是将风险降到最低,并没有消除风险。如果你的目标是显示一个网站,浏览器将是一个更安全的选择。

trans-unit.source: All js and javascript code blocks are linted with standard-markdown.
trans-unit.target: 所有的 js 和 javascript 代码块均使用standard-markdown标记。

trans-unit.source: All Electron APIs are assigned a process type. Many of them can only be used from the main process, some of them only from a renderer process, some from both. The documentation for each individual API will state which process it can be used from.
trans-unit.target: 所有的Electron API都有一个进程类型。其中许多API只能从主进程中使用,有些只能从渲染器进程中使用,有些则两者都可以使用。每个API的文档都会说明它可以从哪个进程中使用。

trans-unit.source: All above methods remain non-deprecated when called from the main process.
trans-unit.target: 以上所有方法在主进程中调用时,都保持非解密状态。

trans-unit.source: All built-in modules of Node.js are supported in Web Workers, and asar archives can still be read with Node.js APIs. However none of Electron's built-in modules can be used in a multi-threaded environment.
trans-unit.target: Web Workers支持所有Node.js的内置模块，并且仍可以使用Node.js API读取 asar 档案。但是，Electron的内置模块都不能在多线程环境中使用。

trans-unit.source: All dates are our goals but there may be reasons for adjusting the stable deadline, such as security bugs.
trans-unit.target: 所有的日期都是我们的目标,但可能会有调整稳定期限的原因,比如安全漏洞。

trans-unit.source: All features of this API are supported.
trans-unit.target: 支持该API的所有功能。

trans-unit.source: All header names are lowercased.
trans-unit.target: 所有的头名都是小写的。

trans-unit.source: All level one properties of the extra object in the crashReporteroptions object.
trans-unit.target: crashReporter options 对象中 extra 对象的所有第一级属性。

trans-unit.source: All methods that have a return value must start their description with "Returns [TYPE] - Return description"
trans-unit.target: 所有具有返回值的方法都必须以“ Returns [TYPE] -Return description”开始其描述。

trans-unit.source: All mouse events happened in this window will be passed to the window below this window, but if this window has focus, it will still receive keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: 所有发生在这个窗口中的鼠标事件都会被传递到这个窗口下面的窗口,但如果这个窗口有焦点,它仍然会接收键盘事件。

trans-unit.source: All new major and minor releases lines begin with a -beta.N tag for N >= 1. At that point, the feature set is locked. That release line admits no further features, and focuses only on security and stability. e.g. 2.0.0-beta.1.
trans-unit.target: 所有新的主要和次要发行版行 -beta.N 标签开头，表示 N >= 1 。此时，功能部件集已锁定。该发行版不允许进一步的功能，仅关注安全性和稳定性。例如 2.0.0-beta.1 。

trans-unit.source: All new major and minor releases lines begin with a beta series indicated by semver prerelease tags of beta.N, e.g. 2.0.0-beta.1. After the first beta, subsequent beta releases must meet all of the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 所有新的主要发行版和次要发行版行均以beta系列开头，该系列由beta.N的semver预发行标签 beta.N ，例如 2.0.0-beta.1 。在第一个Beta之后，后续的Beta版本必须满足以下所有条件：

trans-unit.source: All of Node.js's built-in modules are available in Electron and third-party node modules also fully supported as well (including the native modules).
trans-unit.target: 所有的Node.js内置模块都可以在Electron中使用，第三方节点模块（也包括本地模块）也得到完全支持。

trans-unit.source: All of Node.js's built-in modules are available in Electron and third-party node modules also fully supported as well (including the native modules).
trans-unit.target: 所有的Node.js内置模块都可以在Electron中使用，第三方节点模块（也包括本地模块）也得到了完全支持。

trans-unit.source: All of Chromium's prebuilt binaries (libchromiumcontent) are downloaded when running the bootstrap script. By default both static libraries and shared libraries will be downloaded and the final size should be between 800MB and 2GB depending on the platform.
trans-unit.target: 运行引导脚本时，会下载Chromium的所有预构建二进制文件（ libchromiumcontent ）。默认情况下，静态库和共享库都将被下载，最终大小应在800MB到2GB之间，具体取决于平台。

trans-unit.source: All patches to upstream projects in Electron are contained in the patches/ directory. Each subdirectory of patches/ contains several patch files, along with a .patches file which lists the order in which the patches should be applied. Think of these files as making up a series of git commits that are applied on top of the upstream project after we check it out.
trans-unit.target: Electron中上游项目的所有修补程序都包含在 patches/ 目录中。 patches/ 每个子目录都包含几个补丁文件，以及一个 .patches 文件，该文件列出了补丁应用的顺序。将这些文件视为组成一系列的git提交，这些提交将在我们检出之后应用于上游项目的顶部。

trans-unit.source: All pull requests require approval from a Code Owner of the area you modified in order to land. Whenever a maintainer reviews a pull request they may request changes. These may be small, such as fixing a typo, or may involve substantive changes. Such requests are intended to be helpful, but at times may come across as abrupt or unhelpful, especially if they do not include concrete suggestions on how to change them.
trans-unit.target: 所有拉动请求都需要得到您修改区域的代码所有者的批准才能着陆。维护者每当审核一个拉取请求时，都可以请求更改。这些可能很小，例如修正了错字，或者可能涉及实质性的更改。此类请求旨在帮助您，但有时可能会突然或无益，尤其是如果它们未包含有关如何更改请求的具体建议时。

trans-unit.source: All pull requests require approval from a Code Owner of the area you modified in order to land. Whenever a maintainer reviews a pull request they may request changes. These may be small, such as fixing a typo, or may involve substantive changes. Such requests are intended to be helpful, but at times may come across as abrupt or unhelpful, especially if they do not include concrete suggestions on how to change them.
trans-unit.target: 所有的上拉请求需要从审批代码所有者你修饰以土地面积。维护者每当审核一个拉取请求时，都可以请求更改。这些可能很小，例如修正了错字，或者可能涉及实质性的更改。此类请求旨在提供帮助，但有时可能会突然或无益，特别是如果它们未包含有关如何更改请求的具体建议。

trans-unit.source: All reactions between the embedder frame and webview are asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入器框架和 webview 之间的所有反应都是异步的。

trans-unit.source: All supported release lines will accept external pull requests to backport fixes previously merged to master, though this may be on a case-by-case basis for some older supported lines. All contested decisions around release line backports will be resolved by the Releases Working Group as an agenda item at their weekly meeting the week the backport PR is raised.
trans-unit.target: 所有受支持的发行版都将接受外部拉取请求，以向后移植先前合并到 master 的修补程序，尽管某些旧的受支持的发行版可能会逐案处理。在发布反向PR提出的那一周，发布工作组将在其每周会议上解决所有与发布线反向移植有关的有争议的决定，作为其议程项目。

trans-unit.source: All the required information to generate a context menu is provided in the context-menu event on each webContents instance. A small example of how to make a context menu with this information is provided below.
trans-unit.target: 每个 webContents 实例的 context-menu 事件中都提供了生成上下文菜单所需的所有信息。下面提供了一个如何使用此信息制作上下文菜单的小示例。

trans-unit.source: All the required information to generate a context menu is provided in the context-menu event on each webContents instance. A small example of how to make a context menu with this information is provided below.
trans-unit.target: 每个 webContents 实例的 context-menu 事件中都提供了生成上下文菜单所需的所有信息。下面提供了一个如何使用此信息制作上下文菜单的小示例。

trans-unit.source: All three cases are covered by the same API - the setProgressBar() method available on an instance of BrowserWindow. To indicate your progress, call this method with a number between 0 and 1. For example, if you have a long-running task that is currently at 63% towards completion, you would call it as setProgressBar(0.63).
trans-unit.target: 所有这三种情况都由相同的API覆盖 BrowserWindow 实例上可用的 setProgressBar() 方法。要指示您的进度，请使用 0 到 1 之间的数字调用此方法。例如，如果您有一个长期运行的任务，当前正在完成的任务为63％，则可以将其称为 setProgressBar(0.63) 。

trans-unit.source: All three cases are covered by the same API - the setProgressBar() method available on an instance of BrowserWindow. To indicate your progress, call this method with a number between 0 and 1. For example, if you have a long-running task that is currently at 63% towards completion, you would call it as setProgressBar(0.63).
trans-unit.target: 所有这三种情况都由相同的API覆盖 BrowserWindow 实例上可用的 setProgressBar() 方法。要指示您的进度，请使用 0 到 1 之间的数字调用此方法。例如，如果您有一个长期运行的任务，当前正在完成的任务为63％，则可以将其称为 setProgressBar(0.63) 。

trans-unit.source: All three cases are covered by the same API - the setProgressBar() method available on instances of BrowserWindows. Call it with a number between 0 and 1 to indicate your progress. If you have a long-running task that's currently at 63% towards completion, you'd call it with setProgressBar(0.63).
trans-unit.target: 这三种情况都由相同的API覆盖 BrowserWindows 实例上可用的 setProgressBar() 方法。用介于 0 和 1 之间的数字来调用它以指示您的进度。如果您有一个长期运行的任务，目前正在完成的任务为63％，则可以使用 setProgressBar(0.63) 来调用它。

trans-unit.source: All three operating systems provide means for applications to send notifications to the user. Electron conveniently allows developers to send notifications with the HTML5 Notification API, using the currently running operating system's native notification APIs to display it.
trans-unit.target: 这三个操作系统都为应用程序提供了向用户发送通知的方法。Electron方便地允许开发人员使用HTML5 Notification API发送通知，并使用当前运行的操作系统的本机通知API进行显示。

trans-unit.source: All three operating systems provide means for applications to send notifications to the user. The technique of showing notifications is different for the Main and Renderer processes.
trans-unit.target: 三种操作系统都为应用程序提供了向用户发送通知的手段。主进程和Renderer进程显示通知的技术是不同的。

trans-unit.source: All windows will be closed immediately without asking the user, and the before-quit and will-quit events will not be emitted.
trans-unit.target: 所有窗口将立即关闭，而无需询问用户，并且不会发出 will-quit before-quit 和退出事件。

trans-unit.source: All windows will be closed immediately without asking user and the before-quit and will-quit events will not be emitted.
trans-unit.target: 所有窗口将立即关闭，而无需询问用户，并且不会发出 will-quit before-quit 和退出事件。

trans-unit.source: All words in the page's title must be capitalized, except for conjunctions like "of" and "and" .
trans-unit.target: 除了 "的 "和 "和 "这样的连词外,页面标题中的所有单词必须大写。

trans-unit.source: Allows resuming cancelled or interrupted downloads from previous Session. The API will generate a DownloadItem that can be accessed with the will-download event. The DownloadItem will not have any WebContents associated with it and the initial state will be interrupted. The download will start only when the resume API is called on the DownloadItem.
trans-unit.target: 允许从上一 Session 恢复 cancelled 或 interrupted 下载。API将生成一个DownloadItem，可通过will-download事件对其进行访问。该DownloadItem不会有任何 WebContents 与它的初始状态将相关 interrupted 。仅当在DownloadItem上调用 resume API时，下载才会开始。

trans-unit.source: Allows resuming cancelled or interrupted downloads from previous Session. The API will generate a DownloadItem that can be accessed with the will-download event. The DownloadItem will not have any WebContents associated with it and the initial state will be interrupted. The download will start only when the resume API is called on the DownloadItem.
trans-unit.target: 允许从上一 Session 恢复 cancelled 或 interrupted 下载。API将生成一个DownloadItem，可以通过will-download事件对其进行访问。该DownloadItem不会有任何 WebContents 与它的初始状态将相关 interrupted 。仅当在DownloadItem上调用 resume API 时，下载才会开始。

trans-unit.source: Also note that native modules may have intermediate files produced which should not be included (as they would also need to be signed). trans-unit.source: Also note that native modules may have intermediate files produced which should not be included (as they would also need to be signed). If you use electron-packager before version 8.1.0, add --ignore=.+\.o$ to your build step to ignore these files. Versions 8.1.0 and later ignore those files by default.

trans-unit.source: Also on Windows and Linux, you can use a & in the top-level item name to indicate which letter should get a generated accelerator. For example, using &File for the file menu would result in a generated Alt-F accelerator that opens the associated menu. The indicated character in the button label gets an underline. The & character is not displayed on the button label.
trans-unit.target: 同样在Windows和Linux上，您可以在顶级项目名称中使用 & 来指示应该获得生成加速器的字母。例如，对文件菜单使用 &File 会生成一个用于打开关联菜单的生成的 Alt-F 加速器。按钮标签中的指示字符带有下划线。在 & 字符不显示按钮标签上。

trans-unit.source: Also, due to the usage of app sandboxing, the resources which can be accessed by the app are strictly limited; you can read App Sandboxing for more information.
trans-unit.target: 另外，由于使用了应用程序沙箱，因此可以限制应用程序可以访问的资源；您可以阅读App Sandboxing了解更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Also, on Windows, you'll need to set the environment variable DEPOT_TOOLS_WIN_TOOLCHAIN=0. To do so, open Control Panel → System and Security → System → Advanced system settings and add a system variable DEPOT_TOOLS_WIN_TOOLCHAIN with value 0. This tells depot_tools to use your locally installed version of Visual Studio (by default, depot_tools will try to download a Google-internal version that only Googlers have access to).
trans-unit.target: 另外，在Windows上，您需要设置环境变量 DEPOT_TOOLS_WIN_TOOLCHAIN=0 。为此，请打开 Control Panel → System and Security → System → Advanced system settings 并添加值为 0 的系统变量 DEPOT_TOOLS_WIN_TOOLCHAIN 。这告诉 depot_tools 使用本地安装的Visual Studio版本（默认情况下， depot_tools 会尝试下载仅Google员工有权访问的Google内部版本）。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can override the local cache. @electron/get will cache downloaded binaries in a local directory to not stress your network. You can use that cache folder to provide custom builds of Electron or to avoid making contact with the network at all.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以覆盖本地缓存。 @electron/get 会将下载的二进制文件缓存在本地目录中，以免给您的网络造成压力。您可以使用该缓存文件夹提供自定义版本的Electron或完全避免与网络联系。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can override the local cache. electron-download will cache downloaded binaries in a local directory to not stress your network. You can use that cache folder to provide custom builds of Electron or to avoid making contact with the network at all.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以覆盖本地缓存。 electron-download 将下载的二进制文件缓存在本地目录中，以免给您的网络造成压力。您可以使用该缓存文件夹提供自定义版本的Electron或完全避免与网络联系。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the IPC primitives that are provided by Electron. To share data between the main and renderer processes, you can use the ipcMain and ipcRenderer modules. To communicate directly between web pages, you can send a MessagePort from one to the other, possibly via the main process using ipcRenderer.postMessage(). Subsequent communication over message ports is direct and does not detour through the main process.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用Electron提供的IPC原语。要在主进程和渲染器进程之间共享数据，可以使用 ipcMain 和 ipcRenderer 模块。要直接在网页之间进行通信，可以使用 ipcRenderer.postMessage() 通过主进程将 MessagePort 从一个发送到另一个。消息端口上的后续通信是直接的，不会绕过主要过程。

trans-unit.source: An asar archive is a simple tar-like format that concatenates files into a single file. Electron can read arbitrary files from it without unpacking the whole file.
trans-unit.target: 一个ASAR归档是一个简单的焦油状的格式，它会连接文件合并为一个文件。Electron可以从其中读取任意文件，而无需解压缩整个文件。

trans-unit.source: An IncomingMessage instance has the following readable properties:
trans-unit.target: 一个 IncomingMessage 实例具有以下可读属性：

trans-unit.source: An Integer indicating the HTTP protocol major version number.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Integer 指示HTTP协议主版本号。

trans-unit.source: An Integer indicating the HTTP protocol minor version number.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Integer 指示HTTP协议次要版本号。

trans-unit.source: An Integer indicating the HTTP response status code.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Integer 指示HTTP响应状态代码。

trans-unit.source: An Integer property that returns the badge count for current app. Setting the count to 0 will hide the badge.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Integer 属性，它返回当前应用程序的标志计数。将计数设置为 0 将隐藏徽章。

trans-unit.source: An Integer property that sets the frame rate of the web contents to the specified number. Only values between 1 and 60 are accepted.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Integer 属性，用于将Web内容的帧速率设置为指定的数字。仅接受1到60之间的值。

trans-unit.source: An Integer representing the currently selected segment. Changing this value immediately updates the control in the touch bar. User interaction with the touch bar will update this value automatically.
trans-unit.target: 代表当前所选句段的 Integer 。更改此值将立即更新触摸栏中的控件。用户与触摸栏的交互将自动更新此值。

trans-unit.source: An Integer representing the unique frame id in the current renderer process. Distinct WebFrame instances that refer to the same underlying frame will have the same routingId.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Integer 表示当前渲染器进程中的唯一帧ID。引用同一基础框架的不同WebFrame实例将具有相同的 routingId 。

trans-unit.source: An Object representing the response HTTP headers. The headers object is formatted as follows:
trans-unit.target: 一个表示响应HTTP标头的 Object 。该 headers 的对象的格式如下：

trans-unit.source: An Apple Disk Image is a packaging format used by macOS. DMG files are commonly used for distributing application "installers". electron-builder supports dmg as a build target.
trans-unit.target: Apple Disk Image是macOS使用的打包格式。DMG文件通常用于分发应用程序“安装程序”。electronic-builder支持 dmg 作为构建目标。

trans-unit.source: An IPC system for communicating intra- or inter-process, and that's important because Chrome is keen on being able to split its work into separate processes or not, depending on memory pressures etc.
trans-unit.target: 用于进程内或进程间通信的IPC系统,这一点很重要,因为Chrome热衷于根据内存压力等,将工作分成独立的进程或不分进程。

trans-unit.source: An alternate transport for Chrome's remote debugging protocol.

trans-unit.source: Another difference is that sandboxed renderers don't modify any of the default JavaScript APIs. Consequently, some APIs such as window.open will work as they do in Chromium (i.e. they do not return a BrowserWindowProxy).
trans-unit.target: 另一个区别是沙盒渲染器不会修改任何默认的JavaScript API。因此，某些API（例如 window.open )将像在Chromium中一样工作（即，它们不返回 BrowserWindowProxy ）。

trans-unit.source: Another difference is that sandboxed renderers don't modify any of the default JavaScript APIs. Consequently, some APIs such as window.open will work as they do in Chromium (i.e. they do not return a BrowserWindowProxy).
trans-unit.target: 另一个区别是，沙盒渲染器不会修改任何默认的JavaScript API。因此，某些API（例如 window.open )将像在Chromium中一样工作（即，它们不返回 BrowserWindowProxy ）。

trans-unit.source: Another difference is that sandboxed renderers don't modify any of the default JavaScript APIs. Consequently, some APIs such as window.open will work as they do in chromium (i.e. they do not return a BrowserWindowProxy).
trans-unit.target: 另一个区别是，沙盒渲染器不会修改任何默认的JavaScript API。因此，某些API（例如 window.open )将像在 BrowserWindowProxy 一样工作（即，它们不返回BrowserWindowProxy）。

trans-unit.source: Another factor is that the Node project patches its version of V8. As mentioned above, Electron builds everything with a single copy of V8, so Node's V8 patches must be ported to that copy.
trans-unit.target: 另一个因素是Node项目对其V8版本进行了修补。如上所述,Electron用V8的单一副本构建一切,所以Node的V8补丁必须移植到该副本上。

trans-unit.source: Another important limitation is that the compiled AppX package still contains a win32 executable - and will therefore not run on Xbox, HoloLens, or Phones.
trans-unit.target: 另一个重要的限制是,编译后的AppX包仍然包含一个win32可执行文件--因此无法在Xbox、HoloLens或Phones上运行。

trans-unit.source: Any UI Electron renders on Linux and Windows including context menus, devtools, etc. will use the dark UI.
trans-unit.target: 任何Electron在Linux和Windows上渲染的UI,包括上下文菜单、devtools等都会使用暗色UI。

trans-unit.source: Any UI Electron renders on Linux and Windows including context menus, devtools, etc. will use the light UI.
trans-unit.target: 任何Electron在Linux和Windows上渲染的UI,包括上下文菜单、devtools等都会使用轻量级UI。

trans-unit.source: Any UI the OS renders on macOS including menus, window frames, etc. will use the dark UI.
trans-unit.target: OS在macOS上渲染的任何UI,包括菜单、窗口框架等都会使用暗色UI。

trans-unit.source: Any UI the OS renders on macOS including menus, window frames, etc. will use the light UI.
trans-unit.target: OS在macOS上渲染的任何UI,包括菜单、窗口框架等都会使用轻度UI。

trans-unit.source: Any native Node.js module can be loaded directly in Web Workers, but it is strongly recommended not to do so. Most existing native modules have been written assuming single-threaded environment, using them in Web Workers will lead to crashes and memory corruptions.
trans-unit.target: 任何原生Node.js模块都可以直接在Web Workers中加载,但强烈建议不要这样做。大多数现有的原生模块都是在单线程环境下编写的,在Web Workers中使用它们会导致崩溃和内存损坏。

trans-unit.source: Any pattern containing a forward or backward slash will be tested against the whole pathname and not just the module. E.g. */foo/bar/*=2 would change the logging level for all code in the source files under a foo/bar directory.
trans-unit.target: 任何包含正斜杠或反斜杠的模式都将针对整个路径名（而不仅仅是模块）进行测试。例如 */foo/bar/*=2 将更改 foo/bar 目录下源文件中所有代码的日志记录级别。

trans-unit.source: Any pattern containing a forward or backward slash will be tested against the whole pathname and not only the module. E.g. */foo/bar/*=2 would change the logging level for all code in the source files under a foo/bar directory.
trans-unit.target: 任何包含正斜杠或反斜杠的模式都将针对整个路径名而不只是模块进行测试。例如 */foo/bar/*=2 将更改 foo/bar 目录下源文件中所有代码的日志记录级别。

trans-unit.source: Any resources not included with your application should be loaded using a secure protocol like HTTPS. In other words, do not use insecure protocols like HTTP. Similarly, we recommend the use of WSS over WS, FTPS over FTP, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序未包含的所有资源都应使用安全协议（如 HTTPS )加载。换句话说，请勿使用 HTTP 之类的不安全协议。同样，我们建议在 WS 上使用 WSS ，在 FTP 上使用 FTPS ，等等。

trans-unit.source: Anyone can request an API be tagged as experimental in a feature PR, disagreements on the experimental nature of a feature can be discussed in the API WG if they can't be resolved in the PR.
trans-unit.target: 任何人都可以在特性PR中要求将一个API标记为实验性的,如果在PR中不能解决,对特性实验性的分歧可以在API WG中讨论。

trans-unit.source: Applications define tasks based on both the program's features and the key things a user is expected to do with them. Tasks should be context-free, in that the application does not need to be running for them to work. They should also be the statistically most common actions that a normal user would perform in an application, such as compose an email message or open the calendar in a mail program, create a new document in a word processor, launch an application in a certain mode, or launch one of its subcommands. An application should not clutter the menu with advanced features that standard users won't need or one-time actions such as registration. Do not use tasks for promotional items such as upgrades or special offers.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序根据程序的功能和用户需要做的关键事情来定义任务。任务应该是不需要上下文的,即应用程序不需要运行就可以工作。它们也应该是正常用户在应用程序中最常见的操作,比如在邮件程序中编写电子邮件信息或打开日历,在文字处理器中创建一个新的文档,在某种模式下启动一个应用程序,或者启动它的一个子命令。应用程序不应该用标准用户不需要的高级功能或注册等一次性操作使菜单杂乱无章。不要将任务用于升级或特别优惠等促销项目。

trans-unit.source: As we work to perform these updates, we seek to create the least disruptive amount of change at any given time, so as many changes as possible will be introduced in a backward compatible manner and deprecated after enough time has passed to give users a chance to upgrade their API calls.
trans-unit.target: 当我们努力执行这些更新时,我们寻求在任何给定的时间内创造最少的破坏性变化,因此尽可能多的变化将以向后兼容的方式引入,并在经过足够的时间后让用户有机会升级他们的API调用后废弃。

trans-unit.source: As web developers, we usually enjoy the strong security net of the browser - the risks associated with the code we write are relatively small. Our websites are granted limited powers in a sandbox, and we trust that our users enjoy a browser built by a large team of engineers that is able to quickly respond to newly discovered security threats.
trans-unit.target: 作为网络开发者,我们通常会享受浏览器这张强大的安全网--我们编写的代码所带来的风险相对较小。我们的网站在沙盒中被赋予了有限的权力,我们相信我们的用户享受到的是一个由庞大的工程师团队打造的浏览器,它能够快速应对新发现的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: Being based on Chromium, Electron requires a display driver to function. If Chromium can't find a display driver, Electron will fail to launch - and therefore not executing any of your tests, regardless of how you are running them. Testing Electron-based apps on Travis, Circle, Jenkins or similar Systems requires therefore a little bit of configuration. In essence, we need to use a virtual display driver.
trans-unit.target: 作为基于Chromium的软件,Electron需要一个显示驱动才能运行。如果Chromium找不到显示驱动,Electron将无法启动--因此无论你如何运行,都无法执行任何测试。在Travis,Circle,Jenkins或类似的系统上测试基于Electron的应用程序需要进行一些配置。本质上,我们需要使用一个虚拟的显示驱动。

trans-unit.source: Both Chromium and Node.js are impressive feats of engineering built by thousands of talented developers. Given their popularity, their security is carefully tested and analyzed by equally skilled security researchers. Many of those researchers disclose vulnerabilities responsibly, which generally means that researchers will give Chromium and Node.js some time to fix issues before publishing them. Your application will be more secure if it is running a recent version of Electron (and thus, Chromium and Node.js) for which potential security issues are not as widely known.

Given their popularity, their security is carefully tested and analyzed by equally skilled security researchers. Many of those researchers disclose vulnerabilities responsibly, which generally means that researchers will give Chromium and Node.js some time to fix issues before publishing them. Your application will be more secure if it is running a recent version of Electron (and thus, Chromium and Node.js) for which potential security issues are not as widely known.

trans-unit.source: By default Electron is built with prebuilt clang binaries provided by the Chromium project. If for some reason you want to build with the clang installed in your system, you can call bootstrap.py with --clang_dir=<path> switch. By passing it the build script will assume the clang binaries reside in <path>/bin/.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Electron是使用Chromium项目提供的预构建的 clang 二进制文件构建的。如果出于某种原因要使用系统中安装的 clang 进行构建，则可以使用 --clang_dir=<path> 开关调用 bootstrap.py 。通过传递它，构建脚本将假定 clang 二进制文件驻留在 <path>/bin/ 。

trans-unit.source: By default Electron is built with prebuilt clang binaries provided by the Chromium project. If for some reason you want to build with the clang installed in your system, you can specify the clang_base_path argument in the GN args.

trans-unit.source: By default Electron manages the devtools by creating an internal WebContents with native view, which developers have very limited control of. With the setDevToolsWebContents method, developers can use any WebContents to show the devtools in it, including BrowserWindow, BrowserView and <webview> tag.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Electron通过使用内部视图创建内部 WebContents 来管理devtools ，开发人员对此的控制非常有限。使用 setDevToolsWebContents 方法，开发人员可以使用任何 WebContents 在其中显示devtools，包括 BrowserWindow ， BrowserView 和 <webview> 标记。

trans-unit.source: By default Electron will download hunspell dictionaries from the Chromium CDN. If you want to override this behavior you can use this API to point the dictionary downloader at your own hosted version of the hunspell dictionaries. We publish a hunspell_dictionaries.zip file with each release which contains the files you need to host here, the file server must be case insensitive you must upload each file twice, once with the case it has in the ZIP file and once with the filename as all lower case.

trans-unit.source: By default, Electron will automatically approve all permission requests unless the developer has manually configured a custom handler. While a solid default, security-conscious developers might want to assume the very opposite.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,Electron会自动批准所有的权限请求,除非开发者手动配置了一个自定义处理程序。虽然这是一个可靠的默认值,但注重安全的开发者可能会想反其道而行之。

trans-unit.source: By default, Electron will not allow websites loaded over HTTPS to load and execute scripts, CSS, or plugins from insecure sources (HTTP). Setting the property allowRunningInsecureContent to true disables that protection.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Electron不允许通过 HTTPS 加载的网站加载和执行来自不安全来源（ HTTP ）的脚本，CSS或插件。将属性 allowRunningInsecureContent 设置为 true 将禁用该保护。

trans-unit.source: By default, if an app of the same name as the one being moved exists in the Applications directory and is not running, the existing app will be trashed and the active app moved into its place. If it is running, the pre-existing running app will assume focus and the previously active app will quit itself. This behavior can be changed by providing the optional conflict handler, where the boolean returned by the handler determines whether or not the move conflict is resolved with default behavior. i.e. returning false will ensure no further action is taken, returning true will result in the default behavior and the method continuing.
trans-unit.target: By default, if an app of the same name as the one being moved exists in the Applications directory and is not running, the existing app will be trashed and the active app moved into its place. If it is running, the pre-existing running app will assume focus and the previously active app will quit itself. This behavior can be changed by providing the optional conflict handler, where the boolean returned by the handler determines whether or not the move conflict is resolved with default behavior. i.e. returning false will ensure no further action is taken, returning true will result in the default behavior and the method continuing.

trans-unit.source: By default, the frameless window is non-draggable. Apps need to specify -webkit-app-region: drag in CSS to tell Electron which regions are draggable (like the OS's standard titlebar), and apps can also use -webkit-app-region: no-drag to exclude the non-draggable area from the draggable region. Note that only rectangular shapes are currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，无框窗口不可拖动。应用程序需要指定 -webkit-app-region: drag 在CSS中拖动以告诉Electron哪些区域是可拖动的（如操作系统的标准标题栏），并且应用程序还可以使用 -webkit-app-region: no-drag 来排除不可拖动的区域可拖动区域的面积。请注意，目前仅支持矩形形状。

trans-unit.source: By default, the new instance will use the same working directory and command line arguments with current instance. trans-unit.target: By default, the new instance will use the same working directory and command line arguments with current instance. When args is specified, the args will be passed as command line arguments instead. When execPath is specified, the execPath will be executed for relaunch instead of current app.

trans-unit.source: By default, this module will check for updates at app startup, then every ten minutes. When an update is found, it will automatically be downloaded in the background. When the download completes, a dialog is displayed allowing the user to restart the app.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,该模块会在应用启动时检查更新,然后每十分钟检查一次。当发现更新时,它将在后台自动下载。当下载完成后,会显示一个对话框,允许用户重新启动应用程序。

trans-unit.source: By default, web pages' cookies and caches will be stored under the userData directory. If you want to change this location, you have to override the userData path before the ready event of the app module is emitted.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，网页的cookie和缓存将存储在 userData 目录下。如果要更改此位置，则必须在发出 app 模块的 ready 事件之前覆盖 userData 路径。

trans-unit.source: By helping to triage the issue: You can do this either by providing assistive details (a reproducible test case that demonstrates a bug) or by providing suggestions to address the issue.

trans-unit.source: Changes the zoom factor to the specified factor. Zoom factor is zoom percent divided by 100, so 300% = 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 将变焦系数更改为指定的系数,变焦系数是变焦百分比除以100,所以300%=3.0。缩放系数是缩放百分比除以100,所以300%=3.0。

trans-unit.source: Changes the zoom level to the specified level. The original size is 0 and each increment above or below represents zooming 20% larger or smaller to default limits of 300% and 50% of original size, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 将缩放级别改为指定级别。原始大小为0,每一个高于或低于0的增量代表放大或缩小20%,分别为原始大小的300%和50%的默认限制。

trans-unit.source: Changes the zoom level to the specified level. The original size is 0 and each increment above or below represents zooming 20% larger or smaller to default limits of 300% and 50% of original size, respectively. The formula for this is scale := 1.2 ^ level.
trans-unit.target: 将缩放级别更改为指定级别。原始大小为0，上下的每个增量代表放大或缩小20％，分别达到默认限制，即原始大小的300％和50％。公式为 scale := 1.2 ^ level 。

trans-unit.source: Child processes typically cache trace data and only rarely flush and send trace data back to the main process. This helps to minimize the runtime overhead of tracing since sending trace data over IPC can be an expensive operation. So, to end tracing, Chromium asynchronously asks all child processes to flush any pending trace data.
trans-unit.target: 子进程通常会缓存跟踪数据,只在很少的情况下刷新并向主进程发送跟踪数据。这有助于最大限度地减少跟踪的运行时开销,因为通过IPC发送跟踪数据是一个昂贵的操作。因此,为了结束跟踪,Chromium异步要求所有子进程刷新任何待处理的跟踪数据。

trans-unit.source: Child processes typically cache trace data and only rarely flush and send trace data back to the main process. This helps to minimize the runtime overhead of tracing since sending trace data over IPC can be an expensive operation. So, to end tracing, we must asynchronously ask all child processes to flush any pending trace data.
trans-unit.target: 子进程通常会缓存跟踪数据,只在很少的情况下刷新并向主进程发送跟踪数据。这有助于最大限度地减少跟踪的运行时开销,因为通过IPC发送跟踪数据可能是一个昂贵的操作。因此,为了结束跟踪,我们必须异步地要求所有子进程刷新任何待处理的跟踪数据。

trans-unit.source: Child processes typically cache trace data and only rarely flush and send trace data back to the main process. This is because it may be an expensive operation to send the trace data over IPC and we would like to avoid unneeded runtime overhead from tracing. So, to end tracing, we must asynchronously ask all child processes to flush any pending trace data.
trans-unit.target: 子进程通常会缓存跟踪数据,只有很少的情况下才会刷新并将跟踪数据发送回主进程。这是因为通过IPC发送跟踪数据可能是一个昂贵的操作,而且我们希望避免跟踪带来不必要的运行时开销。所以,为了结束跟踪,我们必须异步要求所有子进程刷新任何待处理的跟踪数据。

trans-unit.source: Child windows opened with the nativeWindowOpen option will always have Node.js integration disabled, unless nodeIntegrationInSubFrames is true.
trans-unit.target: 除非 nodeIntegrationInSubFrames 为 true ，否则使用 nativeWindowOpen 选项打开的子窗口将始终禁用Node.js集成。

trans-unit.source: Chrome 59 (and later) includes support for Verified Media Path (VMP). VMP provides a method to verify the authenticity of a device platform. For browser deployments, this will provide an additional signal to determine if a browser-based implementation is reliable and secure.
trans-unit.target: Chrome 59(及更高版本)包含对验证媒体路径(VMP)的支持。VMP 提供了一种验证设备平台真实性的方法。对于浏览器部署来说,这将提供一个额外的信号来确定基于浏览器的实现是否可靠和安全。

trans-unit.source: Chromium does not provide residentSet value for macOS. This is because macOS performs in-memory compression of pages that haven't been recently used. As a result the resident set size value is not what one would expect. private memory is more representative of the actual pre-compression memory usage of the process on macOS.
trans-unit.target: Chromium does not provide residentSet value for macOS. This is because macOS performs in-memory compression of pages that haven't been recently used. As a result the resident set size value is not what one would expect. private memory is more representative of the actual pre-compression memory usage of the process on macOS.

trans-unit.source: Chromium has removed support for Flash, and so we must follow suit. See Chromium's Flash Roadmap for more details.
trans-unit.target: Chromium已删除了对Flash的支持，因此我们必须紧随其后。有关更多详细信息，请参见Chromium的Flash路线图。

trans-unit.source: Chromium has removed support for changing the layout zoom level limits, and it is beyond Electron's capacity to maintain it. The function was deprecated in Electron 8.x, and has been removed in Electron 9.x. The layout zoom level limits are now fixed at a minimum of 0.25 and a maximum of 5.0, as defined here.
trans-unit.target: Chromium已删除了更改布局缩放级别限制的支持，并且超出了Electron的能力范围。该功能在Electron 8.x中已弃用，并在Electron 9.x中已删除。现在布局缩放级别限制被固定在最小的0.25，最大值为5.0，所定义这里。

trans-unit.source: Chromium has removed support for changing the layout zoom level limits, and it is beyond Electron's capacity to maintain it. The function will emit a warning in Electron 8.x, and cease to exist in Electron 9.x. The layout zoom level limits are now fixed at a minimum of 0.25 and a maximum of 5.0, as defined here.
trans-unit.target: Chromium已删除了更改布局缩放级别限制的支持，并且超出了Electron的能力范围。该函数将在Electron 8.x中发出警告，并在Electron 9.x中不再存在。现在布局缩放级别限制被固定在最小的0.25，最大值为5.0，所定义这里。

trans-unit.target: Chromium logs can be enabled via the ELECTRON_ENABLE_LOGGING environment variable. For more information, see the environment variables documentation.
